title: Integrate Real City Names and Rates from RedBus and Other Booking Sites

requirements.text: Replace placeholder city names with real city data from RedBus or similar booking platforms (e.g., MakeMyTrip, Goibibo) for all transport types (bus, train, taxi)

quotes: take city name and rates from red bus or other bookings site

acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores actual city names from booking platforms instead of generic placeholders
City names are accurate and match real-world locations served by transport operators

requirements.text: Update bus route pricing structure to reflect real RedBus fare data including base fare, taxes, and service fees

quotes: take city name and rates from red bus

acceptanceCriteria: Bus route prices match actual RedBus pricing for equivalent routes
Fare breakdown includes realistic base fare, taxes, and service fee components
Total fare calculation matches booking platform standards

requirements.text: Update train route pricing to use real-world fare data from booking platforms like IRCTC, MakeMyTrip, or similar services

quotes: apply its in project fro bus train and taxi

acceptanceCriteria: Train fares reflect actual pricing for comparable routes and classes
Pricing structure includes realistic fare components (base fare, reservation charges, GST)

requirements.text: Update taxi pricing model to reflect real-world rates from booking platforms like Ola, Uber, or local taxi services based on distance and vehicle type

quotes: apply its in project fro bus train and taxi

acceptanceCriteria: Taxi base fares and per-km rates match actual market rates for sedan, SUV, and van categories
Pricing reflects realistic distance-based calculations used by ride-booking platforms

requirements.text: Ensure all frontend displays (route cards, detail pages, booking summaries, admin tables) correctly show the updated real city names and pricing for all transport types
acceptanceCriteria: RouteResultCard displays real city names and accurate fare breakdown
AdminRoutesTable correctly renders real city data and rates
Booking flow displays accurate pricing throughout the checkout process

constraints: Maintain existing fare breakdown structure (baseFare, tax, serviceFee)
Preserve current admin route management functionality
Keep existing booking and payment flows intact
nonGoals: Live API integration with RedBus or other booking platforms
Automated price updates or synchronization with external services
